agilermi

Interface Authenticator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardAuthenticator

    public interface Authenticator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean authenticate(java.net.InetSocketAddress remoteAddress, java.lang.String authId, java.lang.String passphrase)
      Authenticate a user that established the connection from the given address.
      boolean authorize(java.lang.String authId, java.lang.Object object, java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Authorize a user to invoke a specific method on a specific object.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        boolean authenticate(java.net.InetSocketAddress remoteAddress,
                     java.lang.String authId,
                     java.lang.String passphrase)
        Authenticate a user that established the connection from the given address. This method allows or disallows the RmiRegistry to accept the incoming connection
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - the address of the remote machine
        authId - the authentication identifier of the user
        passphrase - the passphrase to use for authentication
        Returns:
        true if the user has been authenticated successfully, false otherwise.

      • authorize

        boolean authorize(java.lang.String authId,
                  java.lang.Object object,
                  java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Authorize a user to invoke a specific method on a specific object. This method allows to establish fine-grained authorization.
        Parameters:
        authId - the user authentication identifier, the same that ha been used to authenticate the user in the authenticate(InetSocketAddress, String, String) method
        object - the object to which the user requires the access
        method - the method that the user wants invoke
        Returns:
        true if the user is authorized, false otherwise
